name: Baxterite
tagline: A course audit web application for Baxter Academy
body:
![Baxterite](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14347683/15797354/950a8924-29e2-11e6-91df-4673fa3d27ee.png)
### Welcome to Baxterite
Baxterite is an innovative and ethical web application that provides a new method of course audit for Baxter Academy.

### Features
- Program of studies catalog 
- Graduation standards including benchmark requirements
- Class registration and recommendations based on preferences
- Checklist of classes taken and standards achieved
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
